positions.subtitle: iGEM IIT Delhi
positions.description: iGEM IIT Delhi club is working upon a probiotic gene therapy platform for Colorectal cancer. We aim to establish laboratory POC on mammalian cells. I coordinate for wet lab, recruitments and fundraising. Raised more than $4000 till now.
positions.title: Coordinator
positions.description_html: iGEM IIT Delhi club is working upon a probiotic gene therapy platform for Colorectal cancer. We aim to establish laboratory POC on mammalian cells. I coordinate for wet lab, recruitments and fundraising. Raised more than $4000 till now. <!---->

positions.subtitle: iGEM IIT Delhi
positions.description: iGEM stands for International Genetically Engineered Machine. It's a yearly, global synthetic biology competition that aims to improve people's understanding of synthetic biology.I was part of IIT Delhi's iGEM 2023 Tech team. Our team developed Genetically engineered E. Coli which can produce Biosurfactants to treat metal-contaminated water and oil spills and pitched it in Paris. We secured a silver medal.
positions.title: Technical Executive
positions.description_html:
iGEM stands for International Genetically Engineered Machine. It's a yearly, global synthetic biology competition that aims to improve people's understanding of synthetic biology.

I was part of IIT Delhi's iGEM 2023 Tech team. Our team developed Genetically engineered E. Coli which can produce Biosurfactants to treat metal-contaminated water and oil spills and pitched it in Paris. We secured a silver medal.

positions.subtitle: eDC IIT Delhi(Entrepreneurship Development Cell)
positions.description: Heading the Startup Support Vertical. eDC SS is a dedicated vertical to network with early to growth-stage startups and solve their problems. The two major sub-parts are:1. eDC SS Portal: Developing web applications for Startups all across India to hire Talent, Find the Right Investors, and Access tech support and credits. You can know more at edcstartupsupport.vercel.app2. Network: SS outreach to startups in and outside the campus and grow the Founder’s Net, an exclusive club. We work as eDC consultants for these startups to connect them with the right people in the industry like Investors, Profs, Legal Consultants, Service Providers etc by leveraging the network of eDC.
positions.title: Head of Startup Support
positions.description_html:
Heading the Startup Support Vertical. eDC SS is a dedicated vertical to network with early to growth-stage startups and solve their problems. The two major sub-parts are:

1. eDC SS Portal: Developing web applications for Startups all across India to hire Talent, Find the Right Investors, and Access tech support and credits. You can know more at edcstartupsupport.vercel.app

2. Network: SS outreach to startups in and outside the campus and grow the Founder’s Net, an exclusive club. We work as eDC consultants for these startups to connect them with the right people in the industry like Investors, Profs, Legal Consultants, Service Providers etc by leveraging the network of eDC.

positions.subtitle: eDC IIT Delhi(Entrepreneurship Development Cell)
positions.description: Coordinated various roles during IIT Delhi Business and Entrepreneurship Conclave 2023.• Onboarded and worked closely with Media Houses like ABP Live, inc42 Media, Amar Ujala as Official Media Partners.• Coordinated eDC Shark Tank 3.0, a Flagship Startup-Investor Networking event. Managed a team of 15+ volunteers to conduct this multi-staged month-long event. Executed the finale by connecting 100 startups with 16+ VCs and Angel Investors.• Moderated Keynote sessions of Amit Agarwal (Co-Founder, NoBroker) and Nitin Jain (CEO, OfBusiness)• Worked closely with E-cells of other colleges to form a Pan India Network of E-cells across India to collaborate on various events of BECon 23.
positions.title: Executive - Startup, Investor & Corporate Alumini Relations
positions.description_html:
Coordinated various roles during IIT Delhi Business and Entrepreneurship Conclave 2023.

• Onboarded and worked closely with Media Houses like ABP Live, inc42 Media, Amar Ujala as Official Media Partners.
• Coordinated eDC Shark Tank 3.0, a Flagship Startup-Investor Networking event. Managed a team of 15+ volunteers to conduct this multi-staged month-long event. Executed the finale by connecting 100 startups with 16+ VCs and Angel Investors.
• Moderated Keynote sessions of Amit Agarwal (Co-Founder, NoBroker) and Nitin Jain (CEO, OfBusiness)
• Worked closely with E-cells of other colleges to form a Pan India Network of E-cells across India to collaborate on various events of BECon 23.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: An exciting summer endeavour to automate hardware prototyping for startups. Small team, deep early engagement from startups and students from Bangalore and NCR. Couldn't find PMF. Closed.

experience.title: XR Fellowship
experience.description: Selected in the Top 20 Finalists across India for Meta XR Startup Program in collaboration with Meity Startup Hub (Govt. of India) to develop new products in Healthcare XR.

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: Xperia 3D (previously Rjwada) is an IIT Delhi-based B2B Saas Platform building AR Plugins to enhance Customer Experience for Retail E-commerce sites, especially in Fashion. I was the 5th guy to join the team, therefore worked in multiple roles. Built the marketing team from scratch to develop multi-frontier marketing campaigns. Worked on the product development of the Sellers App (Merchant Dashboard) and worked with the business development team to onboard initial clients.
